alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 16 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT SATURDAY NIGHT... The North Carolina Department of Environmental Quality in Raleigh, NC has issued an Air Quality Action Day for Fine Particulates for... * Code RED for Brunswick County * Code ORANGE for New Hanover County * Until midnight EDT Saturday night. An Air Quality Action Day means that Fine Particulate concentrations within the region may approach or exceed unhealthy standards. For additional information...please visit the North Carolina Division of Air Quality Web site at www.ncair.org/airaware/forecast/.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
